content: worked in the round do not turn chain 1 does not count as a stitch 1 single_crochet in same stitch close the gap in the back of the dress by working 1 single_crochet into next stitch see diagram 1 1 single_crochet in next 24 stitches at the corner 1 single_crochet into chain 2 space from previous row 1 single_crochet into next chain 2 space from previous row where the dress is folded in half and the corners come together this is the 1st arm hole see diagram 4 & 5 1 single_crochet in next 50 stitches 1 single_crochet into next chain 2 space from previous row 1 single_crochet into next chain 2 space from previous row creates 2nd arm hole 1 single_crochet into last 24 stitches end round with a slip_stitch into 1st stitch of the round 104 single_crochet diagram 1 - pull up loop in first stitch after the gap ____________________________________________________________________________________________ page 6 of 12 unique crochet & knitting designs by theresa knapp ©2016 please do not reproduce change share or sell images or patterns diagram 2 & 3 - 2 loops on hook yo pull through both loops finish single_crochet diagram 4 & 5 1 single_crochet into chain 2 spaces in previous row creates arm holes skirt worked in rounds without turning round 1 9 months chain 1 does not count as a stitch 1 single_crochet in same stitch 1 single_crochet in every stitch slip_stitch into first next stitch *1 half_double_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * 3x 1 half_double_crochet in remaining stitches 108 half_double_crochet round 3 9 months chain 2 + 2 double_crochet cluster into same stitch counts as 3 double_crochet cluster chain 1 skip 1 stitch * 3 double_crochet cluster into next stitch chain 1 skip 1 stitch repeat from * until end of round slip_stitch into middle of the 1st cluster stitch 45 clusters 45 chain 1 spaces 12 months chain 2 + 2 double_crochet
